snippet: The dock that receives the large ferries filled with tourists arriving on Liberty Island from Battery Park in Manhattan and Liberty State Park in New Jersey was badly damaged by Hurricane Sandy and may need to be rebuilt.
abstract: The dock that receives the large ferries filled with tourists arriving on Liberty Island from Battery Park in Manhattan and Liberty State Park in New Jersey was badly damaged by Hurricane Sandy and may need to be rebuilt.

headline.main: Storm Leaves Lady Liberty and Ellis Island Cut Off From Visitors
headline.print_headline: Storm Leaves Island Landmarks Cut Off From Visitors
